00096         inline void setSightAngle(double angle)
00097         {
00098                 if (angle < 0)
00099                         angle *= -1;
00100                 while (angle > 360)
00101                         angle -= 360;
00102 
00103                 sightAngle = angle;
00104         }
00105

00117         }

00141         {

00143                         this->stealth = 1;
00144                 else if (stealth < 0)
00145                         this->stealth = 0;

00148         }
